H0.text: Which African country changed its capital city from Zomba to Lilongwe in January 1975. Zambia

H1.text: Which African country changed its capital city from Zomba to Lilongwe in January 1975. Mozambique

H2.text: Which African country changed its capital city from Zomba to Lilongwe in January 1975. Tanzania

H3.text: Which African country changed its capital city from Zomba to Lilongwe in January 1975. Malawi

A4.text: Lilongwe is its capital and largest city, while the next three largest cities are Blantyre, Mzuzu, and Zomba, the former capital.

A5.text: The capital is Lilongwe, and its commercial centre is Blantyre, with a population of over 500,000 people.
